shortcuts.title: Keyboard Shortcuts Settings
shortcuts.visibilityDesc: Shortcut key used to show/hide the application
shortcuts.pasteDesc: Key combination used to paste saved texts. Combined with numbers (1-9) (e.g., Ctrl+1, Ctrl+2, etc.)
shortcuts.pinDesc: Key combination used to pin texts to specific positions. Combined with numbers (1-9) (e.g., Ctrl+Shift+1, Ctrl+Shift+2, etc.)

about.title: About MultiCopier
about.author: Developer
about.description1: MultiCopier is a modern desktop multiple clipboard application that allows you to store multiple texts in memory and access them quickly using shortcut keys.
about.description2: You can copy, pin, and paste texts anytime using keyboard shortcuts.
about.aboutContent: MultiCopier is a modern desktop multiple clipboard application that allows you to store multiple texts in memory and access them quickly using shortcut keys. You can copy, pin, and paste texts anytime using keyboard shortcuts.

language.title: Language Settings
language.restart: You may need to restart the application for the changes to fully take effect.

ui.notice: Note: Shortcuts like Ctrl+1, Ctrl+2 copy text to clipboard and automatically paste it.
ui.emptyStateDesc: When you copy text (Ctrl+C), it will be automatically added here.
ui.confirmClearAll: Are you sure you want to delete all copied items?
ui.copiedToClipboard: Copied to clipboard! (You can paste with Ctrl+V)
ui.shortcutAutoAdd: Automatically adds text to the list
ui.shortcutPinText: Pins the last copied text to the corresponding position
ui.pinningDesc1: You can pin texts to a specific position. Pinned items remain at the same position even when new items are added or the list is sorted.
ui.pinningMethod1: Click the "Pin" button next to an item, or
ui.pinningMethod2: First copy text (Ctrl+C) and then use Ctrl+Shift+[1-9] shortcut to pin it to the position of your choice.
ui.pinningDesc2: Pinned items are marked with yellow color and ðŸ“Œ icon.
ui.autopasteDesc1: When you use shortcuts from Ctrl+1 to Ctrl+9, the selected text is copied to the clipboard and automatically pasted into the active application.
ui.autopasteDesc2: This feature works with Windows keyboard simulation and sends Ctrl+V.
ui.dataDesc1: All texts you copy and pin are automatically saved. Your data is preserved even after you close and reopen the application.
